Package index

All functions

add_kill_op()
Replace hvkl operations with harv + kill
check_hru_waterbalance()
Check average annual water balance simulations at the HRU level
filter_hru_at_harvkill()
Filter HRUs by their variable values at harvest/kill
get_file_version()
Get the Highest Version Number of a File
get_hru_id_by_attribute()
Get HRU ids by filtering for HRU attributes
plot_basin_var()
Plot selected basin variable aggregated by defined time step
plot_climate_annual()
Plot annual overview of simulated climate variables of a SWAT+ simulation
plot_hru_pw()
Aggregate and plot simulated variables saved in hru_pw_day
plot_hru_pw_day()
Plot daily simulated variables which are saved in hru_pw_day
plot_hru_var()
Aggregate and plot simulated variables saved in hru_pw_day
plot_hru_var_aa()
Plot simulated variables of filtered HRUs saved in hru_wb_aa with boxplots
plot_monthly_snow()
Plot average monthly precipitation components rainfall and snofall and the snow melt
plot_ps()
Plot yearly simulated point source values (as yearly loads or average concentrations)
plot_qtile()
Plot tile drain flow histogram and distribution curve
plot_variable_at_harvkill()
Boxplot for relevant variables at harvest-kill
plot_waterbalance()
Plot the average annual water balance
plot_water_partition()
Plot simulated variables of water partition of filtered HRUs saved in hru_wb_aa
print_avannual_qtile()
Print the average annual qtile for HRUs
print_triggered_mgt()
Print the triggered management operations from the mgt outputs for a certain HRU
report_mgt()
Generate a report table that compares the scheduled and triggered managements
run_softcal_waterbalance()
Runs the SWAT+ soft-calibration routine for water balance components.
run_swat_verification()
Run simulations for model verification
update_landuse_labels()
Update the land use labels which were written by SWATfarmR

Developed by Christoph Schuerz, Svajunas Plunge.
